title: VICTAM Asia and Health & Nutrition Asia 2024
description: VICTAM Asia is the premier exhibition for showcasing innovative technologies and machinery for the animal feed processing industry. GRAPAS Asia focuses on grain, rice, and flour processing and offers a broad perspective on milling technology within these industries. Both events are organised by the Victam Corporation. Co-located is Health & Nutrition Asia, part of VIV worldwide. Health and Nutrition Asia is the niche trade show event, part of VIV worldwide, focusing on innovation in nutrition, pharmaceutics, and high-tech animal health solutions. Organised by VNU Asia Pacific and VNU Europe. VICTAM Asia and Health & Nutrition Asia 2024, by VICTAM and VIV, is a 3-days trade show at BITEC, Bangkok. VICTAM is the world’s largest feed & grain event. VIV has the largest worldwide network in health & nutrition and is best connected in Asia. The combination of these key show organisers offers a unique platform in Asia.
